scenario_text.value:
Oh, hey, Takuma. This isn’t the spot. There’s
nothing here.

I sure have the worst luck, don’t I? Watch me
be the only one who doesn’t make it back.
Hey, don’t say that.

By the way, Takuma, what were things like
when you went back?
What do you mean?

Well, people must have been worried about us,
right?

(Actually, because the flow of time is so
different, nobody had even really noticed.)

(But if I say that, Minoru might get
depressed. What should I say?)
About that...
They were worried.
Actually...
One girl missed you.

Uh...yeah. They’d only just found out we were
missing, but they were kinda worried.
Yeah, I figured. We need to get back soon.

Oh, and by the way, I’ve started to really
pull my own weight around here.

So if you’re ever in trouble, you can count
on me!

(I couldn’t just tell him nobody had even
noticed.)

(Still, even if it was to reassure him,
I don’t like lying to Minoru. It hurts.)
Actually, Minoru...

(...It’s no use. I don’t know how to finish
that sentence.)
You know what, Takuma? Forget it.

It’s not like you telling me will change what
we need to do, right?

We’re going back, no matter what. All of us
together, right?!

There was this one girl who was worried about
you, Minoru. She really seemed to miss you.

(I mean, I might as well start things off
with a joke.)

Seriously?! Who was it? Was it someone
I know?!
Oh, uh... actually...
Come on, out with it already!

(Oh no... I didn’t realize Minoru would be
that into the idea.)

Well, she’s... No, never mind. I shouldn’t
say any more.
Why not?!

Because I promised her I wouldn’t tell you.
She was kind of embarrassed.
Oh, I get it. So she’s really modest...

But hey, if we make it back to our world,
I think you’ve got a shot!
So let’s make that happen, Minoru!
You said it! I am going to do this!
(I’m so sorry, Minoru...)
Hey, Takuma. Seriously, let’s make it back.

After all, between the two of us, it’s
practically a guarantee! Right?!
